bioAsHtml:
Natural born curious, gamer, and dreamer, I always loved to smash my keyboard randomly waiting for cool things to happen. Even if I made a lot of different stuff back then, I decided very early that my professional life would be full of video games. I worked several years on AAA console games for big publishers and now I'm making my way as an independent with my own company Monkey Moon.

As I try to be a bit more than a code monkey I love talking about video game development in places people don't expect

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
acceptedTalks.title: Video games: The quest for smart dumbness.

bio:
Natural born curious, gamer, and dreamer, I always loved to smash my keyboard randomly waiting for cool things to happen. Even if I made a lot of different stuff back then, I decided very early that my professional life would be full of video games. I worked several years on AAA console games for big publishers and now I'm making my way as an independent with my own company Monkey Moon.

As I try to be a bit more than a code monkey I love talking about video game development in places people don't expect
